ygData.subject: Re: Hello Again
ygData.msgSnippet: ... DOH! *hits self on forehead* I caaaaan t believe I didn t think of that. However, as a rule I just don t like kiting, not the concept, the act of doing it.
ygData.messageBody:
>You have more than two speeds you know. You can switch to
>walking with Accelerando, or ducking, or both. You can also
>equip/unequip your drum. There's a lot of tweaking you can do
>to make yourself fast enough to outrun them, but slow enough
>not to lose them.


DOH! *hits self on forehead* I caaaaan't believe I didn't think of that.
However, as a rule I just don't like kiting, not the concept, the act of
doing it.


>> *sigh* so I went off to the Elven Dictionary and found "E'Taurguin" or
"Of
>
>What Elven dictionary?


http://www.grey-company.org/GreatHall/Language.htm

have fun!

>I don't understand what the point of making it bard/rogue only
>is if anyone can use it for the illusion effect.

Exactly, I have to wonder this too, pretty weird if you ask me.


Tszaaz
